data.title: The Pinnacle Financial Group
data.text:
MICHAEL ANIELLO

Michael Aniello joined LPL Financial in March of 2015 as a Wealth Manager. Prior to working at LPL Financial, he was with Northwestern Mutual as a Financial Representative from 1999 – 2015. With a major in finance and a minor in marketing, he graduated From Magna Cum Laude from Adelphi University. He holds three security: Series 6, Series 7 (Uniform Securities Law), and Series 63 through LPL Financial. In total Mike has 17 years of experience in the financial services industry. He currently resides in Nesconset with his wife Marlene and daughter Leah.

BENNETT BERMAN

Ben became a member of LPL Financial in March of 2020 as a Wealth Advisor. He brings many years of experience, previously working at Merrill Lynch, Shearson Lehman Brothers, Smith Barney, Prudential Securities and UBS Financial Services.

He was born in Cambridge Massachusetts and during his childhood he moved to Huntington, NY. He went on to raise a family of 3 children in Dix Hills and currently lives in Holbrook on Long Island.

His lifelong passions are investing and photography. Aside from Long Island, his favorite place in the world is Aruba.

Ben has a Series 7 license, and Life/Health Insurance license both held with LPL Financial. He received his BA from American University.

Linda Borst

Linda became a member of the Pinnacle Financial group in 2020 and has 41 years of financial services industry experience.

Starting at Drexel Burnham in 1982 and affiliated with American Express, LPL Financial as well as Wells Fargo Advisors Prior to Joining Pinnacle Financial Group.

She has a daughter from a previous marriage.

Linda has attended the Security Training School and The American College and earned her ChFC Designation.

Her strengths are in Managing Assets and Advisory Services Retirement Planning and Estate Planning. She works with families and their children when working on estate planning so as to have an informed relationship with clients.

Linda is Series 7 licensed for 43 yeas as well as a Series 66 held by LPL Financial. Linda is also Insurance Licensed and has a ChFC Designation ( Chartered Financial Consultant).

LISA CASPARE

Lisa Caspare became a member of The Pinnacle Financial Group in 2017. She made her change to LPL as an independent advisor to work with clients on their complete financial picture.

Before she joined Pinnacle, Ms. Caspare worked at JP Morgan Securities, Astoria Bank, Metlife, and in public and private accounting. She began her career in the financial services industry in 1998. She holds a Bachelor of Science degree from St John’s University with a concentration in Accounting. After graduating from St. Johns, Ms. Caspare earned her Property and Casualty License, Life and Health Insurance licenses, as well as her Series 7 (General Securities License) and Series 63 (Uniform Securities License), both held at LPL Financial. Outside of work, she enjoys dancing, as well both skiing and bike riding.

PAUL CARMICHAEL

Paul Carmichael became a member of The Pinnacle Financial Group as a retirement benefits advisor in 2015. Prior to Pinnacle, he worked for both UB Pensions and Dreyfus Retirement Services. With both UB Pensions and Dreyfus Retirement Services, Paul specialized in the marketing of services, as well as administering clients’ plans, designing new clients’ plans, conducting enrollment meetings, and speaking at seminars. Paul has an MBA in Finance and General Management from Dowling College, BA from the state University College at Oneonta, and is a QKA designated member of the American Society of Pension Professionals and Actuaries. He has also obtained the ERPA circular 230 designation which allows him to represent clients as power of attorney on pension issues.

CRAIG HASSEL

Craig Hassel is a seasoned financial advisor with over 28 years of experience in the industry. He is an expert in retirement planning, financial planning, and estate planning and is known for his deep understanding of the financial markets and his ability to help clients achieve their financial goals.

Craig began his career in finance in 1993 and has since built a reputation as a trusted advisor, helping families and individuals plan for their financial future. He has a keen eye for detail and is dedicated to providing his clients with customized financial solutions that meet their unique needs and goals.

As an Independent Financial Advisor and Portfolio Manager, Craig has a wealth of knowledge and experience in the financial sector. He has a proven track record of success, having previously worked for Morgan Stanley, where he honed his skills and gained a wealth of knowledge and experience.

In addition to his financial expertise, Craig is also an accomplished life insurance salesman. He understands the importance of protecting his clients' assets and provides tailored life insurance solutions that meet their specific needs.

Aside from his professional life, Craig is a proud father of two and enjoys spending time with his family. He is an avid boater and fisherman, and he loves to travel and explore new places. Craig's passion for life and his dedication to his clients are what make him a successful financial advisor and a trusted friend to those he serves.

RICHARD LAHN

Richard Lahn joined LPL Financial as a Financial Consultant in 2012. Richard graduated from SUNY Farmingdale with a degree in Business. He then received his MBA from Molloy College in Personal Financial Planning. Richard has been in the financial industry since 2004.

Richard serves clients throughout Long Island and specializes in retirement planning. He provides goal-based financial planning, helps clients analyze their financial situation and provides general financial guidance moving forward.

In his spare time, Richard enjoys reading, staying active, trying new things, cooking, and building things with his hands. Richard currently resides in Levittown with his wife and two children, Abigail and Liam. The highest compliment I can receive is a referral from a client!

Lenny Marzigliano

Lenny became a member of The Pinnacle Financial Group in 2023 and brought with him over two decades of financial services industry experience. Throughout this time, he has had the benefit of seeing firsthand the impact of providing quality advice based on a true understanding of each client's unique needs. He believes that the foundation of all financial success and prosperity begins with having a comprehensive wealth management plan in place, one that covers all aspects of planning and preparing for significant life events. This includes asset management, retirement planning, estate planning and tax mitigation. He works closely with his clients, as well as their CPAs and attorneys, to prepare a cohesive financial plan that meets their needs. Lenny's past affiliations have been with AG Edwards & Sons, Wachovia Securities, Wells Fargo Advisors and Stifel Nicolaus prior to joining The Pinnacle Financial Group. Lenny was born and raised in New York and lives in Kings Park with his wife, Lori. They've spent over 20 years together and enjoy raising their boys, Gavin and Cole. Lenny is Series 7 licensed, held by LPL Financial, and Series 65 & 66 licensed, held by The Pinnacle Financial Group, as well as insurance licensed in several states.

THOMAS MUSTO

Thomas became a member of The Pinnacle Financial Group in 2017 and has 21 years of financial services industry experience. Thomas’ past affiliations have been with Morgan Stanley, Citi Smith Barney and Wells Fargo Advisors prior to joining The Pinnacle Financial Group. He is married to his wife Diana and has 2 children from a previous marriage. Morgan 27, who recently got his CPA accreditation & Mariah 24, who recently graduated from LIU/ CW Post with a Management Degree. Thomas also has 3 step – children (Christina, Anthony & Diana) and 7 grandchildren with his wife Diana. Tom manages the assets of a select group of families and small business and takes pride in the deep relationships he garners with those clients. Thomas’ strengths are (but not limited to) asset management, insurance planning, retirement planning as well as estate planning as it pertains to client investments. He works in conjunction with clients other trusted advisors such as CPA’s and Attorneys to coordinate a successful plan for clients. He feels his job is much more than asset management and that is evidenced by the intergenerational relationships he has with his clients, their children and extended family. Thomas is Series 7 licensed, held by LPL Financial, and Series 66 licensed, held by The Pinnacle Financial Group, as well as Life Insurance licensed.

ROGER PINTO

Roger Pinto joined The Pinnacle Financial Group in 2017 as a Financial Advisor. Before joining The Pinnacle Financial Group, Mr. Pinto worked at Raymond James Financial Services, from 2005 to 2017, and Paine Webber from July 1998 to 2005. Additionally, he maintains a series 6, 7, & 63, held through LPL Financial, also the series 66 securities registrations through LPL Financial and The Pinnacle Financial Group. Apart from the various securities licenses, he holds both health and life insurance licenses. Mr. Pinto has spent the entirety of his career involved in the financial management industry. His path began in college at American University where he earned his MBA. He furthered his financial education by attending Georgetown University, completing his BSBA degree in both management and financial studies. He completed his educational studies at Long Island University where he studied Financial Planning. Outside of work he is happily married with four children. In his free time, he enjoys playing golf, boating, and fishing.

GREGG SHRIRO

Gregg Schriro became a member of LPL Financial in 2013 as a Financial Consultant. Mr. Schriro holds series 6, 63, 65 securities registrations through LPL Financial. He has also earned his Chartered Retirement Planning Counselor (CRPC®) designation from the College of Financial Planning. He is a Financial Consultant to the Affluent and Pension Plans throughout NY and NJ. Mr. Schriro helps clients find strategies in order to manage their Financial Investment Goals. He has been in the Securities Industry since 1998 and graduated from SUNY Buffalo in 1993. Mr. Schriro has been written up in the Wall Street Journal and Long Island Business News. He builds everlasting relationships, provides custom investment advice, and refers to other experts when needed. Mr. Schriro currently resides in Seaford with his wife, Carmela, and their two children, Jack and Evan.

HILLARD SCOTT SAVETH

I graduated college at the U of Miami in 1972 with a BBA. I ran my own clothing company for many years and developed the skills to be a planner and an implementer with good forward vision. In 1998 I went to work at Morgan Stanley as a retail broker and in two years achieved the status of Vice President. In the later part of 2001 I was recruited by Prudential Securities. After two years at Prudential I left with a team of Brokers to begin our lives as Independent Financial Advisors with LPL Financial. I specialize in security selection, sector rotation and putting together diversified portfolios custom fitting each of my various types of clients. I am also a licensed Life Insurance Broker. I am married to Nina Saveth and have two boys. One 25 and the other 10 years old. I live in Dix Hills, NY.

ROBERT SKOFF

Robert Skoff became a member of The Pinnacle Financial Group in September of 2017 as a Financial Advisor. Mr. Skoff, has over 30 years of experience in the financial services industry. His clients are primarily high net worth individuals and families, owners of private companies and corporate executives. He spent a good part of his career with Seaboard Securities Inc, from 1993 to 2008. He then joined Wells Fargo through 2010 and moved onto Oppenheimer & Company as a Financial Advisor until 2017.

Outside of work, Mr. Skoff lives a fulfilling, family centric life. He has been married for 35 years and has 3 children Joseph, an institutional broker, Robert Jr. who works for a startup in Silicon Valley, and Thomas, a junior at Fairfield University. His favorite hobby is exploring wineries with his wife, Far Niente in Napa is his favorite thus far. Additionally, he takes great pride in the mentoring as well as coaching student athletes. Robert takes an active role in their lives thus instilling the fundamental values of financial management.

RYAN THIEL

Ryan Thiel joined LPL in 2015 as a financial advisor and is a member of The Pinnacle Financial Group. After studying computer science in college, he decided to enter the fitness industry. For eight years, Ryan worked as a trainer and manager at two different fitness facilities on Long Island. He passed both the series 7 and series 63 exams and is registered with LPL Financial as well as the Life, Health, and Variable products tests. Ryan has now been in the finance industry for three years.

RON WEXLER

Ron Wexler became a member of The Pinnacle Financial Group in 2017 as a Financial Advisor. Before The Pinnacle Financial Group, Mr. Wexler worked at Oppenheimer & Company from 2010 to 2017, and Citi-Smith Barney from 2002 to 2010. Additionally, he holds series 7, 63, through LPL Financial and the series 66 securities registrations through LPL Financial and The Pinnacle Financial Group. Outside of work he is happily married with three children, 2 boys and 1 girl. In addition to serving the financial needs of his clients, Mr. Wexler enjoys a wide array of hobbies from gardening, which he utilizes to grow his own vegetables, to exercising, specifically partaking in grueling cross fit programs. However, he finds the most joy in his private life when he is able to spend time with his family.

Chris DeVincentis

Chris has been enthusiastically committed to providing personalized wealth management solutions to his clients for over a decade. Throughout this time, he has had the benefit of seeing firsthand the impact of providing quality advice based on a true understanding of each client’s unique needs. He believes the foundation of all financial success and prosperity begins with having a comprehensive wealth management plan in place; one that covers all aspects of planning and preparing for your significant life events.

He takes both an accounting and investment perspective to help clients develop a holistic financial plan to facilitate their Retirement, Cash Flow, Insurance, College Funding, Elder Care and Estate Planning strategies. Chris has extensive experience addressing corporate needs ranging from; RSUs & ISOs, developing Corporate Retirement Plans, Non-Qualified Deferred Comp Plans, Buy-Sell Agreements and other various planning concerns.

Prior to joining The Pinnacle Financial group at LPL Financial, Chris was with Morgan Stanley & Merrill Lynch for 10 years. Chris was ranked as one of the region’s top producers in his peer group, allowing him to be recognized for multiple awards within the firm. Previously, he worked at Deloitte for 5 years. Where he rose to Manager of the Financial Services Group focusing on asset managers and hedge funds.

Chris holds a Bachelor’s Degree of in accounting. Graduating Cum Ladue from the University at SUNY Albany. He currently resides in Huntington NY with his wife and son and is an avid golfer.

John B. Hess, Jr.

Founding Principal

203.655.4700

jhess@nsinvestors.com

John Hess brings over 30 years of experience in portfolio management and private investment counseling to the creative and highly personal approach of North Star Wealth Investors. A Senior Portfolio Manager with JPMorgan for 12 years, he managed relationships and portfolios totaling over $300 million. He was also a Managing Director of the Morse Williams Co. and a Vice President and Senior Portfolio Manager at Fiduciary Trust Co. International. He has a record of integrating diverse investment tools, including alternative investments, to help clients pursue their goals.

John's experience in investment management is built on a foundation of 10 years in international banking with The Bank of New York/Irving Trust Co. For four years he was the bank's Representative in Caracas, Venezuela. He was then appointed the Deputy Branch Manager for the bank in Milan, Italy where he served for 2 years. He returned to New York to manage a global unit conducting business with Central Banks and International Agencies. John later managed portfolios for all of The Bank of New York's Latin American and Greek shipping clients. He speaks Spanish and Italian.

John received his BA in Economics from Bucknell University. He served the US Army as a 1st Lt and Resident Office Commander in Darmstadt, Germany. John lives with his wife in Darien, CT, where he is active in civic organizations: the Exchange Club of New Canaan, the Darien Rotary Club, and the Darien Sail and Power Squadron. Former member of several professional organizations including; the Association for Investment Management and Research (AIMR) and the New York Society of Security Analysts (NYSSA). Cunent member of the Financial Planning Association (FPA).

John is a CERTIFIED FINANCIAL PLANNER™ Professional and holds FINRA series 7 with LPL Financial and his series 66 with both LPL Financial and the Pinnacle Financial Group.

Andrew Hoffman

Managing Director

(646) 808-0342

(203) 655-4700

ahoffman@nsinvestors.com

Andrew Hoffman has managed Equity, Fixed Income and Alternative Assets portfolios for

individuals, Trusts and Foundations for over 35 years.

Andy joined North Star Wealth Investors, LLC in 2019. He was previously with the HSBC

Private Bartle where he was a Senior Portfolio Manager and Senior Vice President from 2007 to

2019 and was a member of the Private Bank Investment Policy Committee. Andy began his

career in 1986 at the JP Morgan Private Bank leaving in 2007 as a Vice President and Portfolio

Manager.

Andy is a graduate of The Hotchkiss School and holds a BA from Connecticut College. He is a

Certified Financial Plaimer™ professional and holds FINRA Series 7 with LPL Financial m1d his

Series 66 with LPL Financial m1d the Pimiacle Financial G1:oup. Andy and his wife divide their

time between New York City and Southport, CT.

NICHOLAS IOCCO

Nicholas Iocco is President of NSI Group Inc. and a Registered Principal with LPL Financial. He became a member of The Pinnacle Financial Group in 2016. He brings a unique perspective to his client relationships. Nick’s mission statement is to help people plan for and live in retirement based on their desired outcomes. He does this by providing specific strategies for each client experience which includes a detailed understanding of the client’s financial needs, determining the clients “Risk Assessment Number,” based on a Nobel Prize methodology, and finally building a Retirement Profile, a flexible “Roadmap” to guide his clients throughout their retirement years. He has also helped and assisted personal clients in estate and elder care planning, investment management, and life and long term care insurance.

For his corporate clients, Nick has created retirement plans and helped facilitate business succession planning for his business owner clients. He has been in the financial services for over 30 years. He graduated with a BA from St. John’s University. He originally began his financial services career with the Guardian Life Insurance Company, and later affiliated himself with the Financial Network, an independent broker/dealer, until 1997 when he joined LPL Financial. He lives with his wife Vicki, in Long Beach, NY and enjoys bicycling and photography.

Falgun Jariwala

Managing Director

203.655.4700

fjariwala@nsinvestors.com

Falgun Jariwala has managed equity and bond portfolios for clients around the world. He began his career as an automotive industry analyst in Mumbai, India then moved to portfolio management at JM Financial, also in Mumbai. He immigrated to the United States in 1985. For over 25 years, he has managed portfolios for high net worth individuals, first at Bank of America (predecessor banks) and later with JPMorgan. His investors span the spectrum of multigenerational wealth to new business owners. Falgun brings special experience in technology and emerging markets to North Star Wealth Investors' clients.

Falgun earned his BS in Chemistry from the University of Mumbai and holds two Masters Degrees: an MBA from South Gujarat University in India and an MBA from the University of Connecticut.. He lives with his wife and son in Stamford, CT.

Falgun serves on the board of a local not-for-profit and is a member of the Stamford Rotary Club.

He holds FINRA series 7 with LPL Financial and his series 66 with both LPL Financial and the Pinnacle Financial Group. Falgun has passed the Certified Financial Analyst (CFA) Level I exam.

GREG KENNEDY

Greg Kennedy has worked in Huntington as a financial consultant for over 24 years and has become a well-known and valued member of the community during that time. After graduating from St. John’s University, he became an advisor at Metlife and worked there until 1995 when he joined A.G. Edwards on West Carver Street in Huntington Village. In 2008 he decided to pursue his dream of owning his own financial services business where he opened his own firm, Atlantic Financial Group, LLC, on New Street in the village.

Greg is involved with many local organizations, currently serving as Past President of the Ancient Order of Hibernians, Division 4; current First Vice President of the Townwide Fund of Huntington and has been on their board of directors since 2009. In January 2018 he joined the board of the Visiting Nurse Service in Northport. He has ongoing involvement with Troicare and the Food Bank at St. Patrick’s Church, as well as ties to various local charitable organizations.

Family, church, and community are important aspects of Greg’s life. He currently resides in St. James with his wife Cathleen, of 20 years, his 2 children; Sara, 17 and Ryan 14 along with their 2 bulldogs Maggie and Mandy. Most of his time at home is spent coaching his son’s various sports teams or being an adult leader of his Boy Scout troop. He is also his daughter’s biggest fan at her cheerleading competitions.

John Cahill

John has over 25 years experience in the field of Financial Planning. He is the founder and owner of Wealth Management Solutions.

He carries securities registrations, as well as, State Life and Health insurance licenses. John has extensive knowledge and training experience in the field of College Planning. Other areas of experience include Long Term Care Planning, Estate Preservation, Retirement, and Investment Planning.

John holds a Certified Financial Planner designation, which helps him meet his client's varied needs. As a noted speaker, John has conducted hundreds of workshops on topics such as Long Term Care, Financial Aid, and Investment Planning. With John's knowledge and experience he can help tailor solutions in various financial situations..
